author: Percy
text: In our township in Attville, there is a project underway to establish a similar project Mr Dladla. We need to re-awaken as community for such projects and create lasting local employment for our communities. Govt programs as TREP will find us on the way. @DSBD_SA @Seda_dsbd https://t.co/FXpcGxM2mR

author: Percy
text: Our Epic Birthday Deals means, EPIC savings. So, tell us using the hashtags – which product you’d like bigger savings on?
